Input: I want to see the likes and dislikes of a video before I actually click on the video to watch it.
I want to be able to make an estimation of the quality of the video before I watch it.
I would like to be able to make the text in the YouTube app a little bit bigger, so I could read it better.
I want to be able to read the titles of the videos better.
I want that the videos on YouTube keep on playing while I turn my screen off.
I listen to music often on YouTube and sometimes I put my phone in my pocket while listening to a music video, while I do that I want to turn off my screen and still hear the music.
I would want all the YouTube videos to be better categorized.
I watch educative videos for school, but I can not always find the video I am looking for in the categories.
I want the videos I want to be loading during the time I watch the ad that comes before the video.
I live in an area with poor connectivity and the videos load very slow.
